title: Making and Testing Goat's Milk Cream Soap Penny Adler SD

tasks.task: Making soap and managing a farm
subtasks: Introducing herself as a soap artisan named Penny Adler
Explain the farm where goats are raised for soap production
Discuss transitioning from bar soap to cream soap
Describe the issue with a previous soap failure and the grant's purpose to improve
Explain the difference between cream soap and other soaps
Describe the lather and quality of cream soap
Highlight the importance of product challenge testing and the associated costs
Mention a departing team member and the impact on the grant
